com.box.androidlib.ResponseListeners
Interface ResponseListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
AddCommentListener, AddToMyBoxListener, AddToTagListener, CopyListener, CreateFolderListener, DeleteCommentListener, DeleteListener, ExportTagsListener, FileDownloadListener, FileUploadListener, GetAccountInfoListener, GetAccountTreeListener, GetAuthTokenListener, GetCommentsListener, GetFileInfoListener, GetTicketListener, GetUpdatesListener, GetVersionsListener, LogoutListener, MakeCurrentVersionListener, MoveListener, PrivateShareListener, PublicShareListener, PublicUnshareListener, RegisterNewUserListener, RenameListener, SearchListener, SetDescriptionListener, ToggleFolderEmailListener, VerifyRegistrationEmailListener
public interface ResponseListener

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a Box API request has been executed.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String STATUS_APPLICATION_RESTRICTED
          Invalid API key, or the API key is restricted from calling the API action.
static java.lang.String STATUS_NOT_LOGGED_IN
          User is not logged in.

          Unknown HTTP response code.
 
Method Summary
 void onIOException(java.io.IOException e)
          Called when an IOException has been thrown while executing the API request.
